      • binary2Decimal

        long binary2Decimal(long binary)
        This binary2Decimal is use to convert from Binary system to Decimal system.
        Parameters:
        binary - take user input as a binary system.(only 0 and 1)
        Returns:
        value of decimal as string.

      • calledNumberSystemConverter

        private void calledNumberSystemConverter(int mainOption,
                                         int subMenuOption)
        This method is use to call all Number System Converter. Main Option:
        1. Binary Converter.
        2. Octal Converter.
        3. Decimal Converter.
        4. Hexadecimal Converter.
        In the Sub-Menu there is a specific Converter.
        Parameters:
        mainOption - take input as integer.
        subMenuOption - take input as integer.

      • numberSystemConversionSubMenu

        void numberSystemConversionSubMenu(int mainOption)
        This function is use to display subMenu of number system conversion. Main Option:
        1. Binary Converter.
        2. Octal Converter.
        3. Decimal Converter.
        4. Hexadecimal Converter.
        Parameters:
        mainOption - option value as interger.
